name.baseName: Combustion - Low Sulfur Coal ; Potassium sulfate / potassium magnesium sulfate fertilizer ; Soft methyl magnesium alum/potassium mixed salt ; Mixing salt conversion method ; All sizes; NESPS2
燃烧-低硫煤 ; 硫酸钾/硫酸钾镁肥 ; 软甲镁矾/钾混盐 ; 混盐转化法 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Potassium in potassium sulfateis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Potassium in potassium sulfateis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所述工业过程涉及燃烧低硫煤生产硫酸钾和硫酸钾镁肥料，及软甲镁矾/钾混盐。 该过程采用适用于所有规模生产的混盐转化法。 该过程主要应用于农业行业，这些肥料用于为植物生长提供必需的养分。 另外，针对污染物控制的末端管控技术特别针对二氧化硫的去除，该物质是使用低硫煤的副产品。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码26,四级代码2623文件，在完整版文件中第4111页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫
源文件中描述为为硫酸钾/硫酸钾镁肥，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫
